dialog.review_text: Best network coverage in Sri Lanka! Never had issues even in remote areas. Their 5G speed is incredible.
Dialog's prepaid packages are reasonably priced and offer good value for money. Been using their services for over 5 years now.
Customer service needs improvement. Had to wait 30 minutes to speak with an agent regarding my bill.
Love their MyDialog app! Makes it so easy to manage my account and buy packages.
Network quality has deteriorated in Colombo area recently. Hope they fix it soon.
Great international roaming packages. Used it during my trip to Singapore without any issues.
Their eSIM activation process was smooth and quick. Very convenient!
Data packages are bit expensive compared to other providers, but the speed and coverage make up for it.
Signal strength is excellent in Kandy area. Never drops calls.
The VAS services are annoying with automatic subscriptions. Please stop this practice!
Recently switched to Dialog from another provider. The transition was seamless.
Their unlimited social media packages are great for young users like me.
Call center staff are very professional and helpful. Resolved my issue quickly.
Network congestion during peak hours in Galle city area needs attention.
The loyalty program rewards are decent. Accumulated enough points for a good discount.
4G coverage in rural areas has improved significantly over the past year.
Bill payments through digital channels are convenient and instant.
Their enterprise solutions for our business are reliable but expensive.
Voice call quality is crystal clear. No complaints!
Too many promotional SMS messages. Need better control over this.
5G speeds are amazing in Colombo central! Getting over 800Mbps consistently.
Coverage at Bandaranaike Airport has improved after recent upgrades.
The family package offers good value for money. All 5 numbers under one bill.
Poor network coverage in basement parking areas of shopping malls.
Online chat support is quick and efficient. Solved my query in minutes.
The prepaid to postpaid conversion process was complicated and time-consuming.
Good coverage along southern expressway. No call drops during travel.
Their home broadband service is reliable but installation took too long.
The Dialog TV bundle with mobile service offers good savings.
Network performance during New Year season was disappointing.
Easy to top up through digital wallets and online banking.
Coverage in Nuwara Eliya area needs improvement, especially during peak season.
The star points reward system is generous compared to other operators.
Had issues with international SMS delivery, but customer service helped resolve it.
Signal strength in Jaffna area is excellent after recent tower upgrades.
Their corporate customer service is professional and responsive.
The mobile app needs a better user interface and more features.
Good coverage in remote areas of Anuradhapura district.
The number portability process was smooth and well-handled.
Internet speeds fluctuate during evening hours in suburban areas.
Appreciate their quick response during recent network outage.
The self-service portal is user-friendly and works well.
Coverage in hill country areas has improved significantly.
Data rollover feature is helpful for managing monthly usage.
Recent price hikes for data packages are disappointing.
Their IoT solutions for our smart home setup work flawlessly.
Good coverage in beach areas of Trincomalee.
The weekend data bonuses are a great addition to packages.
Network performance during cricket matches at RPS needs improvement.
Prompt notification for low balance and package expiry.
Their disaster response during recent floods was commendable.
Need more affordable international calling packages.
Their emergency credit service saved me during a crucial moment. Very helpful feature!
Signal drops frequently in Batticaloa city center during festivals.

Monthly data caps are too restrictive for heavy users like me.
Impressed with their quick tower repair after recent storms in Matara.
The Dialog Premier program benefits are worth the extra cost.
Coverage in Hatton tea estates is spotty. Need more towers.
Their student packages are affordable and include good data allowances.
The video streaming quality on their 4G network is excellent.
Took too long to activate my new connection. Documentation process needs streamlining.
Good coverage throughout the Southern Expressway journey.
The Dialog Club Vision benefits at partner stores are quite useful.
Network is stable even during power outages. Good backup systems.
Wish they had better integration with international payment systems.
The voice call quality in Polonnaruwa area has improved recently.
Their disaster alert SMS system during recent floods was helpful.
Mobile data speeds in Negombo beach area need improvement.
The Dialog store staff in Kandy City Center are very professional.
Good coverage in remote archaeological sites in Anuradhapura.
The auto-renewal system for packages sometimes fails to activate.
Appreciate their support during the recent technology upgrade in our area.
Coverage in Dambulla cave temple area could be better.
The Dialog app's usage tracking feature helps manage data consumption.
Network performance during Vesak festival was disappointing.
Good signal strength in Gampaha industrial area.
The paperless billing system works flawlessly.
Need better coverage in new apartment complexes in Rajagiriya.
Their technical support team resolved my VoLTE issues quickly.
The family tracker service gives peace of mind for parents.
Internet speeds in Kurunegala city center are inconsistent.
Excellent coverage during our hiking trip in Horton Plains.
The budget data packages need more validity period.
Signal strength in Colombo Port area is consistently good.
Their mobile money service needs more merchant partnerships.
The network optimization in Matale town has improved speeds.
Poor coverage in some parts of Badulla district.
Love their special data packages during cricket tournaments.
The IVR system needs more language options for tourists.
Reliable service during my business trips across the country.
Network congestion during peak hours in Pettah area.
The seasonal promotional offers are good value for money.

Their enterprise support team is very responsive.
Need more affordable international roaming packages.
Good signal strength throughout Katunayake airport.
The online payment system sometimes shows transaction delays.
Impressive 5G speeds in Mount Lavinia beach area.
Their charitable initiatives during floods were commendable.
Network performance in Hambantota port area is excellent.
The WiFi calling feature works seamlessly in dead zones.
Need better coverage in newly developed residential areas.

Bought Huawei Nova from Dialog store - good phone but limited app support.

Dialog TV HD channels are not truly HD quality. Picture could be better.

Fiber broadband installation damaged our garden. Poor workmanship.
Dialog TV's education channel package helped my kids during exam preparation.
Purchased OnePlus 12 from Dialog - authentic product with warranty.
Home broadband data cap is too restrictive for a family of five.
New Dialog TV interface is confusing for elderly parents. Need simpler UI.
5G router from Dialog works great in our Mount Lavinia apartment.
Dialog TV's movie package needs more recent releases. Content is outdated.
Trade-in value for old iPhone was fair. Smooth upgrade to iPhone 15.
Broadband connection drops during video conferences. Not reliable for remote work.
Dialog TV's Tamil serial package has great content selection.
Good deals on Samsung tablets with their data packages.

Dialog TV app needs better streaming quality on mobile devices.
Purchased Google Pixel from Dialog - genuine product with good after-sales.
Home broadband installation was quick and professional in Nugegoda.
Dialog TV's sports package missing important football leagues.
Got Xiaomi 14 with Dialog connection - great value bundle.
Broadband technical support is slow to respond to connection issues.
Dialog TV's Sinhala movie collection needs more recent releases.
Good experience buying Apple Watch from Dialog store. Staff knowledge excellent.
Fiber broadband upload speeds are great for my YouTube channel.
Dialog TV receiver replacement took too long after lightning damage.
Pre-ordered Samsung S24+ through Dialog. Great pre-order benefits!
Home broadband router keeps resetting randomly. Frustrating!
Dialog TV's documentary channels are excellent for kids.
Bought Nothing Phone (2) from Dialog - competitive price with warranty.
Broadband speed upgrades are expensive compared to other ISPs.
Dialog TV's recording feature is useful for busy professionals.
Got Vivo V29 with Dialog connection. Good mid-range option.
Broadband installation team was professional and neat in Battaramulla.
Dialog TV picture quality deteriorates too much during bad weather.
OPPO Reno series phones from Dialog come with good warranty coverage.
Home broadband customer service is helpful but wait times are long.
Dialog TV's channel packages are overpriced for limited content.
Motorola Edge 40 from Dialog store - good phone, competitive price.
Fiber broadband has transformed our home entertainment experience.
Dialog TV's children's channels need better parental controls.
Samsung Tab S9 bundle with Dialog data plan is good value.
Broadband service in Nawala area is inconsistent during peak hours.

elephant_house.review_text: The classic EH Cream Soda is unbeatable! Been drinking it since childhood and the taste remains consistent. Perfect carbonation level! üíö
Their ginger beer is absolutely phenomenal - perfect blend of spice and sweetness. Great alternative to regular sodas.
Recently tried their new mango ice cream - disappointing texture and artificial taste. Expected better from Elephant House.
The Necto orange drink needs improvement. Too sweet and artificial tasting compared to other brands.
Their processed meat section at the supermarket is always well-stocked and fresh. The chicken sausages are a family favorite!
Customer service at their factory outlet was exceptional. Staff went above and beyond to help with bulk order.
The vanilla ice cream cups served at their parlor are heavenly! Perfect portion size too. üç¶
Delivery service needs serious improvement. Order arrived 2 hours late and ice cream was completely melted.
Their chocolate ice cream is rich and creamy - definitely premium quality! Worth every rupee.
Elephant House soft drinks remind me of home. No other brand comes close to their unique flavors!
Found a foreign object in their hot dog package. Quality control needs improvement.
The new mobile ordering app is user-friendly and makes ordering so convenient! üì±
Their corporate event catering service was outstanding. Professional staff and great food quality.
The strawberry ice cream lacks real fruit flavor. Tastes too artificial.
Love their seasonal special editions! The Christmas plum ice cream was fantastic! üéÑ

Partnered with Elephant House for our hospital cafeteria management. Their B2B service team is exceptional in maintaining consistent supply and quality standards. The customized beverage dispensers work perfectly in our setting.
Used their event management services for a large corporate gathering (500+ people). Professional setup of mobile ice cream stations and branded beverage corners. Impressive logistics!
Very disappointed with their school canteen management program. Frequent stockouts and poor variety in the healthy options menu. Not suitable for educational institutions.
Our hotel chain has been using their bulk supply services for 3 years. Recently, their ordering portal has become unreliable with frequent crashes. Affecting our inventory management.
Their cinema concession management is outstanding! The new digital ordering kiosks have reduced waiting times significantly. Great revenue sharing model too.
Engaged them for sports event sponsorship. Their brand activation team went above and beyond with creative setups and sampling stations. Perfect execution! üèÜ
Terrible experience with their restaurant supply chain management. Multiple delivery delays caused us significant losses during peak season.
The new B2B client portal is a game changer! Easy bulk ordering, real-time tracking, and automated inventory alerts. Perfect for our supermarket chain.
Using their vending machine services in our office complex. Frequent technical issues and poor maintenance response times.
Fantastic partnership for our theme park operations. Their custom-branded ice cream carts and trained staff added great value to our visitor experience! üé°
Corporate gifting service needs improvement. Limited customization options and delayed deliveries during holiday season.
Their university campus food court management has transformed our dining experience! Love the new digital payment integration and student discount program. üéì
Wedding event catering service was disappointing. Ice cream cart staff was unprofessional and serving sizes were inconsistent.
Excellent sports facility partnership program! Their hydration stations and recovery drink selections are perfect for our gym chain. üí™
Industrial canteen management service is mediocre. Limited menu rotation and frequent equipment breakdowns.
Their beach hotel F&B service package is comprehensive! Great selection of specially designed beach-friendly packaging and mobile cooling solutions. üèñÔ∏è
Poor experience with their shopping mall kiosk franchise program. Inadequate training and operational support.
Innovative solution for our drive-in cinema! Their car hop service and special packaging made the experience unique. Customers love it! üöóüé¨
Festival event partnership was challenging. Their mobile units couldn't handle the crowd volume efficiently.
Outstanding airline catering service! Their special pressurized packaging and portion control is perfect for in-flight service. ‚úàÔ∏è

slt.review_text: The fiber internet speed is amazing! Getting consistent 100Mbps which is perfect for work from home and streaming.

Recently upgraded to their 5G service in Colombo. The speeds are incredible!
Fixed line service has been reliable for years. Good old dependable SLT.
Their new mobile app makes bill payments so convenient. Really impressed with the digital transformation.
Internet disconnects frequently in Galle area. Had to call support multiple times.
TV service quality is excellent. Love the channel package options.
Average service. Nothing special but gets the job done.
Corporate internet service has been fantastic. Great for our business needs.
Customer service needs improvement. Waited 45 minutes for a response.
The new 5G coverage in Negombo is spotty at best.
Decent internet speeds in Batticaloa. Happy with the service.
Mobile data packages are too expensive compared to other providers.
Fixed line installation was quick and professional.
Business solutions team provided excellent support for our office setup.

Online bill payment system is user-friendly and efficient.
Good coverage in remote areas of Anuradhapura.
Reliable service for video conferencing and remote work.
Their enterprise solutions have transformed our business operations.

Fixed line repair took over a week. Poor service.
Good value for money with their family package deals.

Excellent coverage in Trincomalee beach area.

Technical support team is knowledgeable and helpful.

Fixed line installation team was professional and punctual.
